languages.text: "Не убивай его напрасно". {n}Кибелла качает головой.{/n} "Следующие Завету Паутины знают: как мы служим смерти, так и она служит нам. Пусть гибель сего человека станет инструментом в руках твоих, Домин'{name}. Выдай тело изменника за труп Немезита. Всели страх в его сторонников. Дабы развеять обман, враг будет вынужден действовать — так совершит он ошибку и откроется для удара".

"Do not kill him in vain." {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "Those who follow the Tenets of the Web know that, just as we serve death, so too does it serve us. Allow the death of this man to become an instrument in your hands, Domin'{name}. Pass off the traitor's body as that of Nemesite. Instil fear in his supporters. The enemy will be forced to act to undo this deception, exposing himself in the process."
languages.original_text: "Не убивай его напрасно". {n}Кибелла качает головой.{/n} "Следующие Завету Паутины знают: как мы служим смерти, так и она служит нам. Пусть гибель сего человека станет инструментом в руках твоих, Домин'{name}. Выдай тело изменника за труп Немезита. Всели страх в его сторонников. Дабы развеять обман, враг будет вынужден действовать — так совершит он ошибку и откроется для удара".

traits.locale_text: "Do not kill him in vain." {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "Those who follow the way of Ann'shini know that as we serve death, so it serves us. Allow the death of this man to become an instrument in your hands, Enim'{name}. Pass off the traitor's body as that of Nemesite. Instil fear in his supporters. The enemy will be forced to act to undo the deception and thus leave himself exposed."

"Do not kill him in vain." {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "Those who follow the way of Ann'shini know that as we serve death, so it serves us. Allow the death of this man to become an instrument in your hands, Enim'{name}. Pass off the traitor's body as that of Nemesite. Instil fear in his supporters. The enemy will be forced to act to undo the deception and thus leave himself exposed."

"Do not kill him in vain." {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "Those who follow the way of Ahn'shini know that, just as we serve death, so too does it serve us. Allow the death of this man to become an instrument in your hands, Enim'{name}. Pass off the traitor's body as that of Nemesite. Instil fear in his supporters. The enemy will be forced to act to undo this deception, exposing himself in the process."

"Do not kill him in vain." {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "Those who follow the Tenets of the Web know that, just as we serve death, so too does it serve us. Allow the death of this man to become an instrument in your hands, Domin'{name}. Pass off the traitor's body as that of Nemesite. Instil fear in his supporters. The enemy will be forced to act to undo this deception, exposing himself in the process."

languages.text: "Tötet ihn nicht sinnlos." {n}Kibellah schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Wer den Grundsätzen des Netzes folgt, weiß, dass wir dem Tod ebenso dienen, wie er uns dient. Lasst zu, dass der Tod dieses Mannes ein Werkzeug in Euren Händen wird, Domin'{name}. Präsentiert die Leiche des Verräters als Nemesit. Weckt in seinen Anhängern Furcht. Dann muss der Feind reagieren, um diese List aufzudecken ... und dabei wird er sich offenbaren."
languages.original_text: "Do not kill him in vain." {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "Those who follow the Tenets of the Web know that, just as we serve death, so too does it serve us. Allow the death of this man to become an instrument in your hands, Domin'{name}. Pass off the traitor's body as that of Nemesite. Instil fear in his supporters. The enemy will be forced to act to undo this deception, exposing himself in the process."

traits.locale_text: "Tötet ihn nicht sinnlos." {n}Kibellah schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Wer den Grundsätzen des Netzes folgt, weiß, dass wir dem Tod ebenso dienen, wie er uns dient. Lasst zu, dass der Tod dieses Mannes ein Werkzeug in Euren Händen wird, Domin'{name}. Präsentiert die Leiche des Verräters als Nemesit. Weckt in seinen Anhängern Furcht. Dann muss der Feind reagieren, um diese List aufzudecken ... und dabei wird er sich offenbaren."

languages.text: «Que su muerte no sea en balde». {n}Kibellah menea la cabeza.{/n} «Los adeptos de la Doctrina de la Red sabemos que, así como nosotros servimos a la muerte, también la muerte nos sirve a nosotros. Que la muerte de este hombre sea un instrumento en sus manos, Domin'{name}. Exhiba el cadáver del traidor diciendo que es Nemesitio. Infunda temor a sus seguidores. El enemigo se verá obligado a actuar para desmentir este engaño, y al hacerlo quedará expuesto».
languages.original_text: "Do not kill him in vain." {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "Those who follow the Tenets of the Web know that, just as we serve death, so too does it serve us. Allow the death of this man to become an instrument in your hands, Domin'{name}. Pass off the traitor's body as that of Nemesite. Instil fear in his supporters. The enemy will be forced to act to undo this deception, exposing himself in the process."

traits.locale_text: «Que su muerte no sea en balde». {n}Kibellah menea la cabeza.{/n} «Los adeptos de la Doctrina de la Red sabemos que, así como nosotros servimos a la muerte, también la muerte nos sirve a nosotros. Que la muerte de este hombre sea un instrumento en sus manos, Domin'{name}. Exhiba el cadáver del traidor diciendo que es Nemesitio. Infunda temor a sus seguidores. El enemigo se verá obligado a actuar para desmentir este engaño, y al hacerlo quedará expuesto».

languages.text: 「無駄に殺してはダメ」{n}キベラは首を横に振る。{/n}「アーシニの道に従う者は、私達が死に仕えるように、死も私達に仕えることを知っている。この男の死が、あなたの手の中の道具となることを許して、ドミン・{name}。裏切り者の死体をネメサイトの死体だと偽るの。支持者に恐怖心を植え付けるのよ。敵はこの嘘を晴らすために行動せざるを得なくなり、その過程で自らの正体をさらすことになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Do not kill him in vain." {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "Those who follow the Tenets of the Web know that, just as we serve death, so too does it serve us. Allow the death of this man to become an instrument in your hands, Domin'{name}. Pass off the traitor's body as that of Nemesite. Instil fear in his supporters. The enemy will be forced to act to undo this deception, exposing himself in the process."

traits.locale_text: 「無駄に殺してはダメ」{n}キベラは首を横に振る。{/n}「アーシニの道に従う者は、私達が死に仕えるように、死も私達に仕えることを知っている。この男の死が、あなたの手の中の道具となることを許して、ドミン・{name}。裏切り者の死体をネメサイトの死体だと偽るの。支持者に恐怖心を植え付けるのよ。敵はこの嘘を晴らすために行動せざるを得なくなり、その過程で自らの正体をさらすことになるでしょう」

languages.text: “不要这样白白杀掉他。”{n}绮贝菈摇了摇头。{/n}“每位教义的追随者都明白这个道理：当我们侍奉死亡时，死亡也会侍奉我们。让这个人的死亡成为你手中的工具吧，秘者{name}。我们可以将这个叛徒的尸体伪装成涅墨斯特的尸体，让他的支持者惧怕。这样一来，我们的敌人将不得想办法拆穿我们的谎言，而在这个过程中，他会暴露他的行踪。”
languages.original_text: "Do not kill him in vain." {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "Those who follow the Tenets of the Web know that, just as we serve death, so too does it serve us. Allow the death of this man to become an instrument in your hands, Domin'{name}. Pass off the traitor's body as that of Nemesite. Instil fear in his supporters. The enemy will be forced to act to undo this deception, exposing himself in the process."

traits.locale_text: “不要这样白白杀掉他。”{n}绮贝菈摇了摇头。{/n}“每位教义的追随者都明白这个道理：当我们侍奉死亡时，死亡也会侍奉我们。让这个人的死亡成为你手中的工具吧，秘者{name}。我们可以将这个叛徒的尸体伪装成涅墨斯特的尸体，让他的支持者惧怕。这样一来，我们的敌人将不得想办法拆穿我们的谎言，而在这个过程中，他会暴露他的行踪。”

languages.text: « Ne le tuez pas en vain, {n}songe Kibellah en secouant la tête.{/n} Les disciples qui suivent les Préceptes de la Toile savent que nous servons aussi bien la mort qu'elle nous sert, nous. Arrangez-vous pour que le trépas de cet homme soit l'instrument de votre volonté, Domin'{name}. Faites passer son cadavre pour celui de Némésite. Instillez la peur dans le cœur de ses partisans. L'ennemi sera contraint d'agir pour dénoncer ce mensonge, et ce faisant, il se jettera dans la gueule du loup. »
languages.original_text: "Do not kill him in vain." {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "Those who follow the Tenets of the Web know that, just as we serve death, so too does it serve us. Allow the death of this man to become an instrument in your hands, Domin'{name}. Pass off the traitor's body as that of Nemesite. Instil fear in his supporters. The enemy will be forced to act to undo this deception, exposing himself in the process."

traits.locale_text: « Ne le tuez pas en vain, {n}songe Kibellah en secouant la tête.{/n} Les disciples qui suivent les Préceptes de la Toile savent que nous servons aussi bien la mort qu'elle nous sert, nous. Arrangez-vous pour que le trépas de cet homme soit l'instrument de votre volonté, Domin'{name}. Faites passer son cadavre pour celui de Némésite. Instillez la peur dans le cœur de ses partisans. L'ennemi sera contraint d'agir pour dénoncer ce mensonge, et ce faisant, il se jettera dans la gueule du loup. »

languages.text: "Onu boş yere öldürme." {n}Kibellah başını sallıyor.{/n} "Ağ'ın İlkeleri'ne biat edenler bilir ki, nasıl bizler ölüme hizmet ediyorsak o da bize hizmet eder. Bu adamın ölümünü işe yarar bir şekilde kullan Domin'{name}. Hainin cesedini Nemezit'inmiş gibi göster. Destekçilerinin kalbine korku sal. Düşman bu aldatmacanın etkilerini bertaraf etmek için harekete geçmeye zorlanacak, bu sırada da kendisini açık edecektir."
languages.original_text: "Do not kill him in vain." {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "Those who follow the Tenets of the Web know that, just as we serve death, so too does it serve us. Allow the death of this man to become an instrument in your hands, Domin'{name}. Pass off the traitor's body as that of Nemesite. Instil fear in his supporters. The enemy will be forced to act to undo this deception, exposing himself in the process."
